text: Ani jevha tumacya palanakartyane pharistyanna pharmavile ki mi dharativara eka khalipha (asa samuha jo ekamekannantara ye'ila) banavita ahe. Tevha (phariste) mhanale, kaya tu dharativara asa lokanna nirmana karasila, je ticyavara phasada ani raktapata karatila ani amhi tujhya stuti-prasansesaha tujhe gunagana ani tujhi pavitrata varnana karato. Tyane pharmavile, je mi janato tumhi nahi janata
